note.p: Career: Joined the Navy as Surgeon's mate; Surgeon General, Jamaica (1774); Stayed with Dr Maxwell Garthshore FRS (1775) on his return to London in 1777; worked at Kew; Regimental Surgeon to the Jamaica Regiment (1779); Physician to Sir Ralph Abercrombie's expedition to the West Indies (1795); knew Joseph Banks. Daniel Solander, John Fothergill, J Pringle and other FRS
References: Olwyn M Blouet, 'Bryan Edward, FRS, 1743-1800' in NR 2000 vol 54 pp 215-222
